author: Special Correspondent
text:
An unidentified miscreant on Tuesday threw stones on the stage from where AIADMK functionary and former Minister P.Kannan was addressing a public meeting here.

AIADMK party functionary of Uppalam constituency had organised a public meeting and had taken up distribution of welfare assistance on the eve of birth day celebrations of Tamil Nadu Chief Minister and AIADMK general secretary Jayalalithaa.

Tamil Nadu Minister for Commercial Taxes and Registration M.C.Sampath, AIADMK organising secretary S. Semmalai, Puducherry unit secretary P.Purushothaman and other MLAs were present on the occasion.

While Mr. Kannan was speaking at the meeting, an unknown person from the direction of the railway tracks adjacent to the venue threw stones on to the stage. The incident created a furore among the audience. Continuing his speech, Mr. Kannan said somebody who is jealous about the growth of the party, has indulged in this mischief.

AIADMK cadres are not afraid of anything or anyone, he declared. Mr. Kannan said his goal is to bring the AIADMK to power in the Union Territory to relieve the people from their sufferings.
title: Stage attacked as AIADMK functionary addresses meet
